扟字的基本解释

扟
shēn
从上挹取或择取。
减；剥。

扟字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shēn］
［《廣韻》所臻切，平臻，生。］
(1)剥损。
(2)挞。

扟字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　扟； 康熙笔画：7； 页码：页418第03
【唐韻】所臻切【集韻】疏臻切，?音莘。【說文】从上挹也。【廣韻】自上擇取物也。　又【博雅】掊扟，減也。【元包經】損扟且剺。傳曰：扟且剺剝之也。

扟字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
扟字的起名意思

暂无。

Ming
Basic explanation of words
Ming
shēn
Take or choose from above.
Minus; stripping.
Ming
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [shēn]
["Guangyun" is perfected, leveled, and born. ]
(1) Stripping.
(2) Tart.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Collection] [Hand Character Department] 　扟; Kangxi Strokes: 7; Page Number: Page 418 03
[Tang Yun] Suo Zhen cut [Ji Yun] Shu Zhen cut,? Yin Xin. 【Said the text】From the top. [Guangyun] Choose from above.　[Bo Ya] Pinch again, reduce it. [Yuan Bao Jing] Damage and suppression. Chuan said: Just take it away and strip it away.
